Description: Fragment of the body of a Clazomenian painted pottery black figure slim amphora. Parts of siren and sphinx (from lower zone): on the dark paint below, a purple stripe. White dots and purple stripe at the base of the siren's tail.
Bibliographic references: CVA British Museum 8 / Corpus Vasorum Antiquorum: Great Britain 13, British Museum 8 (Pl. GB 587, 8)
Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 132)
